after slaving away on this game since 2016 it just has no charm left. Its baffling to me how a game that had me hooked just a few years ago has turned into immediate disappointment and regret after just one game or waiting the 5-10 minutes for a queue "why am i playing this" and getting off. I can do more change with a fucking penny and a box. Shitty ass game no wonder its called shitterwatch these days
